merchantNotFound: We couldn't find the store you were looking for, please try again later.
merchantNoSquareId: The store hasn't set up their Square ID yet.
locationNoSquareId: This location hasn't set up their Square ID yet.
noMainLocation: This store hasn't designated a main location.
customerNoSquareId: Your account lacks a Square ID. Please update your information.
locationNoId: Oops! We couldn't find a location for this order.

merchantNoSquareAccessToken: The store hasn't set up their Square access yet.
orderNoSquareId: Your order is missing a Square ID. Please contact support.
orderExists: This order already exists. No need to duplicate.
orderNotFound: Oops! We couldn't find the order you're looking for.
